text: Jeff Ward (Born 1986) is an american actor from Washington, D.C.. He is most known as Buggy the clown in Netflix live action series One Piece based on the manga of the same name. He also acted in the television series Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.. Category:1986 births Category:Actors from Washington, D.C. Category:American actors Category:Living people
title: Jeff Ward
